input.sentences: they are going to artcar fest .
they saw some pretty cool cars .
the woman is having a great time .
the man is really enjoying the art .
output.sentences: On vacation I met the sweetest couple.
They told me about some sort of fest where they show their artcar.
I didn't understand, but then the woman showed me some pics of pretty cool cars.
The woman was in the photos most of the time.
The man seemed to be enjoying her more than the pics of the art.
